amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a frontier extended stay clinic demonstration project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1096 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1096 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S8681; text: CR S8681) To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a frontier extended stay clinic demonstration project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1096 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1096 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Murkowski.
